$set.emailAlarmContent:
Hello There is TapData
An error occurred in your task.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Error time：{errorTime}
Error Log: {errorLog}
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
Your task initial sync has been completed.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Completion time:{completionTime}
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
Your task Start CDC. Task name: 【{taskName}】
CDC time: {cdcTime}
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
Your task CDC delay.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Delay times: {delayTime}ms
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
Your task has been stopped.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Stop time: {stopTime}
This mail was sent by TapData.

$set.emailAlarmTitle: 【TapData Notification: Average processing time exceeds threshold】{taskName}
$set.emailAlarmContent:
Hello There is TapData
The node current average processing time exceeds threshold.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Node name: {nodeName}
Current: {currentValue}ms Threshold: {threshold}ms
Occurred Time: {occurredTime}
This mail was sent by TapData.

$set.emailAlarmTitle: 【TapData Notification: Average processing time exceeds threshold】{taskName}
$set.emailAlarmContent:
Hello There is TapData
The node current average processing time exceeds threshold.
Task name: 【{taskName}】
Node name: {nodeName}
Current: {currentValue}ms Threshold: {threshold}ms
Occurred Time: {occurredTime}
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
Your verification task [{taskName}] has encountered an error and stopped at {errorTime}. Please pay attention.
This mail was sent by TapData.

$set.emailAlarmTitle: TapData Notification:The verification results are inconsistent】{taskName}
$set.emailAlarmContent:
Hello There is TapData
The quick count verification result of your verification task [{taskName}] is inconsistent. The current number of differing rows is: {count}. Please pay attention.
This mail was sent by TapData.

Hello There is TapData
The associated field value verification result of your verification task [{taskName}] is inconsistent. The current difference in table data is: {count}. Please pay attention.
This mail was sent by TapData.
